post:
# About us
noez.de is a prepaid based VPS, webspace and dedicated server provider, with high-quality hardware located in premium data centers in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
We have been providing hosting services since 2012. 

# VPS offers
## KVM 1 SSD
1 CPU Core
2 GB RAM
20 GB SSD
1000 GB Bandwidth
10 Gbits/s Node
1 IPv4 + IPv6
[€5.25/mo](https://noez.de/cart.php?pid=327&a=add "€5.25/mo")
## KVM 1 HDD
1 CPU Core
2 GB RAM
40 GB HDD
1000 GB Bandwidth
10 Gbits/s Node
1 IPv4 + IPv6
[€4.50/mo](https://noez.de/cart.php?pid=321&a=add  "€4.50/mo")
## LXC 1 SSD
1 CPU Core
2 GB Ram
20 GB SSD
1000 GB Bandwidth
1 Gbits/s Node
1 IPv4 + IPv6
[€4.25/mo](https://noez.de/cart.php?pid=390&a=add "€4.25/mo")
## LXC 1 HDD
1 CPU Core
2 GB Ram
40 GB HDD
1000 GB Bandwidth
1 Gbits/s Node
1 IPv4 + IPv6
[€3.50/mo](https://noez.de/cart.php?pid=383&a=add "€3.50/mo")

# Test IPs
KVM: 5.230.28.83
LXC: 5.230.69.215

# Features
* 100% prepaid
* Toll-free payment
* Additional IPv4 for €1.50/mo
* We are not a reseller
* DDoS protection (up to 1 Tbit/s)
* Many useful tools
* Instant access to your server immediately after payment (depends on stock)
* Two-factor-authentication
* 24/7 monitoring and technical support 

# Payment Methods
All servers are based on the prepaid principle. So you don‘t need to worry about endless contracts.
We accept Alipay, Amazon Pay, Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Apple Pay, Bank Transfer, Google Wallet, Klarna, Mastercard, Maestro, Paypal, Paysafecard, Visa, Stripe, Sofortüberweisung, EPS, SEPA, Barzahlen, Giropay, przelewy24 and iDEAL. 

If you have any questions, please feel free to open a ticket on [www.noez.de](http://noez.de "www.noez.de").
